name: MitM attacks against HTTPS over public wifi networks
description: Feasability study, and implementation of attacks on HTTPS over public wifi networks against users' privacy.

name: Theater tickets booking web application
description: Database design, backend and frontend implementation of a ticket booking website for theaters.

name: Deca compiler
description: A compiler which takes Deca (a subset of Java) as an input and outputs Assembly for the Motorola 68000 (simulated).

name: ENSIShell
description: Implementation of a shell (using readline) which handles jobs.
